title: Privacy Policy
intro: This privacy notice explains how sprunki phase 3 Game handles information when you use our website.

contact.title: Contact Information
contact.email: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at: contact@sprunkiphase3.online

info.title: Information Collection and Use
info.description: We do not collect or store any personal information from our users. Our website only provides HTML5 games through iframes.

cookies.title: Cookies
cookies.description: We use only essential cookies that are necessary for the website to function properly. These cookies do not track personal information.

thirdParty.title: Third-Party Content
thirdParty.description: Our games are provided through iframes from third-party game providers. These providers may have their own privacy policies and cookie practices. We recommend reviewing their privacy policies for more information.

children.title: Children's Privacy
children.description: Our website is intended for general audiences. We do not knowingly collect any personal information from children under 13 years of age.

changes.title: Changes to This Privacy Policy
changes.description: We may update our Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page.
